title: Skript如何取消玩家的攻击效果？
txt_content: 参考梦世界，一秒内玩家只有一次攻击时有效的，无效的攻击完全造成不了伤害、也没有击退

replies.author: CziSKY
replies.txt_content:
CziSKY 发表于 2017-5-28 09:45
on damage:
    if difference between {DamageCoolDown.%attacker%} and now is less than 1 second:
     ...

on damage:
    if difference between {DamageCoolDown.%attacker%} and now is less than 1 second:
        cancel event 
        message "&c你还不能攻击!" to attacker 

quq忘写发送给玩家了..

replies.author: CziSKY
replies.txt_content:

on damage:

replies.author: xiaoXG
replies.txt_content: 感觉楼主服务器应该是玩家卡伤害了？
